# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Initial project structure
- Basic authentication module
- Client interface for Boomi Platform API
- Comprehensive test coverage setup
- Development environment configuration

### Changed
- Updated license to Apache 2.0
- Standardized file headers with proper licensing

### Fixed
- License consistency across configuration files

## [0.1.0] - 2025-07-27

### Added
- Initial release
- Basic SDK structure for Boomi Platform integration
- Authentication and client modules
- Test framework setup
- Development tooling configuration
